verses.verse: Now<WG1161> faith<WG4102> is the substance<WG5287> of things<WG4229> hoped<WG1679> for, the evidence<WG1650> of things not seen.<WG991>
For by it the elders<WG4245> obtained<WG3140> a good report.<WG3140>

Through faith<WG4102> we understand<WG3539> that the worlds<WG165> were framed<WG2675> by the word<WG4487> of God,<WG2316> so<WG1519> that things which<WG3588> are seen<WG991> were not made<WG1096> of things which do appear.<WG5316>

By faith<WG4102> Abel<WG6> offered<WG4374> to God<WG2316> a more excellent<WG4119> sacrifice<WG2378> than<WG3844> Cain,<WG2535> by which<WG3739> he obtained<WG3140> witness<WG3140> that he was righteous,<WG1342> God<WG2316> testifying<WG3140> of his gifts:<WG1435> and by it he being dead<WG599> yet<WG2089> speaks.<WG2980>

By faith<WG4102> Enoch<WG1802> was translated<WG3346> that he should not see<WG1492> death;<WG2288> and was not found,<WG2147> because<WG1360> God<WG2316> had translated<WG3346> him: for before<WG4253> his translation<WG3331> he had this testimony,<WG3140> that he pleased<WG2100> God.<WG2316>

But without<WG5565> faith<WG4102> it is impossible<WG102> to please<WG2100> him: for he that comes<WG4334> to God<WG2316> must<WG1163> believe<WG4100> that he is, and that he is a rewarder<WG3406> of them that diligently<WG1567> seek<WG1567> him.

By faith<WG4102> Noah,<WG3575> being warned<WG5537> of God of things not seen<WG991> as yet,<WG3369> moved<WG2125> with fear,<WG2125> prepared<WG2680> an ark<WG2787> to the saving<WG4991> of his house;<WG3624> by the which<WG3739> he condemned<WG2632> the world,<WG2889> and became<WG1096> heir<WG2818> of the righteousness<WG1343> which is by faith.<WG4102>

By faith<WG4102> Abraham,<WG11> when he was called<WG2564> to go<WG1831> out into<WG1519> a place<WG5117> which<WG3739> he should<WG3195> after<WG3195> receive<WG2983> for an inheritance,<WG2817> obeyed;<WG5219> and he went<WG1831> out, not knowing<WG1987> where<WG4226> he went.<WG2064>

By faith<WG4102> he sojourned<WG3939> in the land<WG1093> of promise,<WG1860> as in a strange<WG245> country, dwelling<WG2730> in tabernacles<WG4633> with Isaac<WG2464> and Jacob,<WG2384> the heirs<WG4789> with him of the same promise:<WG1860>
For he looked<WG1551> for a city<WG4172> which has<WG2192> foundations,<WG2310> whose<WG3739> builder<WG5079> and maker<WG1217> is God.<WG2316>

Through faith<WG4102> also<WG2532> Sara<WG4564> herself<WG846> received<WG2983> strength<WG1411> to conceive<WG2602> seed,<WG4690> and was delivered<WG5088> of a child<WG5088> when she was past<WG3844> age,<WG2244> because<WG1893> she judged<WG2233> him faithful<WG4103> who had promised.<WG1861>

Therefore<WG1352> sprang<WG1080> there even<WG2532> of one,<WG1520> and him as good as dead,<WG3499> so many as the stars<WG798> of the sky<WG3772> in multitude,<WG4128> and as the sand<WG285> which<WG3588> is by the sea<WG2281> shore<WG5491> innumerable.<WG382>

These<WG3778> all<WG3956> died<WG599> in faith,<WG4102> not having received<WG2983> the promises,<WG1860> but having seen<WG1492> them afar<WG4207> off, and were persuaded<WG3982> of them, and embraced<WG782> them, and confessed<WG3670> that they were strangers<WG3581> and pilgrims<WG3927> on<WG1909> the earth.<WG1093>
For they that say<WG3004> such<WG5108> things declare<WG1718> plainly<WG1718> that they seek<WG1934> a country.<WG3968>
And truly,<WG3303> if<WG1487> they had been mindful<WG3421> of that country from where<WG3739> they came<WG1831> out, they might have<WG2192> had<WG2192> opportunity<WG2540> to have returned.<WG344>

But now<WG3570> they desire<WG3713> a better<WG2909> country, that is, an heavenly:<WG2032> why<WG1352> God<WG2316> is not ashamed<WG1870> to be called<WG1941> their God:<WG2316> for he has prepared<WG2090> for them a city.<WG4172>

By faith<WG4102> Abraham,<WG11> when he was tried,<WG3985> offered<WG4374> up Isaac:<WG2464> and he that had received<WG324> the promises<WG1860> offered<WG4374> up his only<WG3439> begotten<WG3439> son,
Of whom<WG3739> it was said,<WG2980> That in Isaac<WG2464> shall your seed<WG4690> be called:<WG2564>
Accounting<WG3049> that God<WG2316> was able<WG1415> to raise<WG1453> him up, even<WG2532> from the dead;<WG3498> from where<WG3606> also<WG2532> he received<WG2865> him in a figure.<WG3850>
By faith<WG4102> Isaac<WG2464> blessed<WG2127> Jacob<WG2384> and Esau<WG2269> concerning<WG4012> things to come.<WG3195>
By faith<WG4102> Jacob,<WG2384> when he was a dying,<WG599> blessed<WG2127> both<WG1538> the sons<WG5207> of Joseph;<WG2501> and worshipped,<WG4352> leaning on the top<WG206> of his staff.<WG4464>

By faith<WG4102> Joseph,<WG2501> when he died,<WG5053> made<WG3421> mention<WG3421> of the departing<WG1841> of the children<WG5207> of Israel;<WG2474> and gave commandment<WG1781> concerning<WG4012> his bones.<WG3747>

By faith<WG4102> Moses,<WG3475> when he was born,<WG1080> was hid<WG2928> three<WG5150> months<WG5150> of his parents,<WG3962> because<WG1360> they saw<WG1492> he was a proper<WG791> child;<WG3813> and they were not afraid<WG5399> of the king's<WG935> commandment.<WG1297>
By faith<WG4102> Moses,<WG3475> when he was come<WG1096> to years,<WG1096> <WG3173> refused<WG720> to be called<WG3004> the son<WG5207> of Pharaoh's<WG5328> daughter;<WG2364>

Choosing<WG138> rather<WG3123> to suffer<WG4778> affliction<WG4778> with the people<WG2992> of God,<WG2316> than<WG2228> to enjoy<WG2192> <WG619> the pleasures<WG2237> of sin<WG266> for a season;<WG4340>

Esteeming<WG2233> the reproach<WG3680> of Christ<WG5547> greater<WG3187> riches<WG4149> than the treasures<WG2344> in Egypt:<WG125> for he had respect<WG578> to the recompense<WG3405> of the reward.<WG3405>
By faith<WG4102> he forsook<WG2641> Egypt,<WG125> not fearing<WG5399> the wrath<WG2372> of the king:<WG935> for he endured,<WG2594> as seeing<WG3708> him who is invisible.<WG517>

Through faith<WG4102> he kept<WG4160> the passover,<WG3957> and the sprinkling<WG4378> of blood,<WG129> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> he that destroyed<WG3645> the firstborn<WG4416> should touch<WG2345> them.
By faith<WG4102> they passed<WG1224> through<WG1224> the Red<WG2281> sea<WG2281> as by dry<WG3584> land: which<WG3739> the Egyptians<WG124> assaying<WG3984> <WG2983> to do were drowned.<WG2666>
By faith<WG4102> the walls<WG5038> of Jericho<WG2410> fell<WG4098> down, after they were compassed<WG2944> about<WG2944> seven<WG2033> days.<WG2250>
By faith<WG4102> the harlot<WG4204> Rahab<WG4460> perished<WG4881> not with them that believed<WG544> not, when she had received<WG1209> the spies<WG2685> with peace.<WG1515>

And what<WG5101> shall I more<WG2089> say?<WG3004> for the time<WG5550> would fail<WG1952> me to tell<WG1334> of Gedeon,<WG1066> and of Barak,<WG913> and of Samson,<WG4546> and of Jephthae;<WG2422> of David<WG1138> also,<WG5037> and Samuel,<WG4545> and of the prophets:<WG4396>

Who<WG3739> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> subdued<WG2610> kingdoms,<WG932> worked<WG2038> righteousness,<WG1343> obtained<WG2013> promises,<WG1860> stopped<WG5420> the mouths<WG4750> of lions.<WG3023>

Quenched<WG4570> the violence<WG1411> of fire,<WG4442> escaped<WG5343> the edge<WG4750> of the sword,<WG3162> out of weakness<WG769> were made<WG1743> strong,<WG1743> waxed<WG1096> valiant<WG2478> in fight,<WG4171> turned<WG2827> to flight<WG5437> the armies<WG3925> of the aliens.<WG245>

Women<WG1135> received<WG2983> their dead<WG3498> raised<WG386> to life again:<WG386> and others<WG243> were tortured,<WG5178> not accepting<WG4327> deliverance;<WG629> that they might obtain<WG5177> a better<WG2909> resurrection:<WG386>
And others<WG2087> had<WG2983> trial<WG3984> of cruel mockings<WG1701> and scourgings,<WG3148> yes,<WG1161> moreover<WG1161> of bonds<WG1199> and imprisonment:<WG5438>

They were stoned,<WG3034> they were sawn<WG4249> asunder,<WG4249> were tempted,<WG3985> were slain<WG1722> with the sword:<WG3162> they wandered<WG4022> about<WG4022> in sheepskins<WG3374> and goatskins;<WG122> <WG1192> being destitute,<WG5302> afflicted,<WG2346> tormented;<WG2558>
(Of whom<WG3739> the world<WG2889> was not worthy:<WG514>) they wandered<WG4105> in deserts,<WG2047> and in mountains,<WG3735> and in dens<WG4693> and caves<WG3692> of the earth.<WG1093>
And these<WG3778> all,<WG3956> having obtained<WG3140> a good report<WG3140> through<WG1223> faith,<WG4102> received<WG2865> not the promise:<WG1860>
God<WG2316> having provided<WG4265> some<WG5100> better<WG2909> thing for us, that they without<WG5565> us should not be made<WG5048> perfect.<WG5048>
